replies.body: May I ask what is usually in the swag bag, will be watching it at the Hoyts cinema in WA.{{champion:32}}
Hey the bag contains a skin and some other goodies!

May I ask what skin it is?
And what other goodies to be exact.
The skin is a surprise as are all the other contents :) you will be happy I am sure.

> skin is a surprise

Amumu or Fiddlesticks?
lol I am not saying :)

How many tickets are left for:
Luna park?
Just a question :P
We have no tickets for the final in the big top but you can come to the park all day and take part in our community activities and then watch in the park on one of our big screens!

So would entry be free?
Or would we still need to pay our way in?

There are 2 different things going on:
1) the whole day of community activities (this is free and anyone can come)
2) the final live at the Big Top inside Luna Park (this is the sold out event). You can though still stay in the park with many of us as there are many areas where we will have hug screen and seats.

Oh oka, ty <3
Oh another quick question (sorry for annoying u guys ALOT about my questions):
'Will we be able to see the finals at ANY Hoyts cinema? Or specific ones?'
Hey..I just wanted to ask a question..so if i get the OPL grand Final Luna park Ticket (the $35 one) i can use that to ride the Ferry from Circular quay?.. Foreign dude being lost again.. :(

Hi SkrillFreak. The $35 ticket is for the Luna Park rides only not the OPL Final in the Big Top. The ferry is free to ride you just need to book ticket on the link above. You don't need a ticket to enter the park or to take part in the LoL Community Activities and watch the OPL Final in one of the viewing areas in the park.

Im in Broome WA :(
I also dont have the money to fly down {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
Then make sure you join the rest of the region on Twitch and cheer on the OCE teams, see you online!
Just wondering, my friends and I will be watching this at Highpoint in VIC and we were wondering, what will be available there? For instance Merch stands and other stuff like that!
Hi we don't have merchandise on sale at HOYTS but each cinema has a community representative that is organizing activities for all attendees. Hope this helps.
only 6000 people allowed in the park at 1 time, so what if you have a big top ticket and its full.... or do big top tickets get priority, or i could just be reading it wrong
Hey, if you have a big top ticket see a member of the staff on the entrance and you will be able to gain access.
None in the ACT :({{item:3070}}
Is there a way to get ACT on it next time???
Sure we will take this on board for next time.
Will all rioters be there or only the australian ones or what? are there even australain rioters?

Yes there are OCE RIoters and I am one of them :) We have some Riot guests from the US team who are doing the champ design sessions and the Q&A's you can book onto these tomorrow at 9am. Come along and get involved it will be awesome!
Is there by any chance we can know what skill we will get? cos i want to get a yorick skin :3 {{champion:83}}
Hi, it's a surprise, but if you are grabbing a show bag you will not be disappointed.
ok {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
If you go without a ticket is there still a chance you can buy show bags? Perhaps if some can't make it?
Hi, sorry the bags are not on sale but we have an awesome League Merchandise store on site.
is my friends from worldgaming.us allow to come? they are international fps pros.
Hi anybody can come along to the free activities during the day as listed above in the article.
How does one host an event (North Queensland?)
Hi, what kind of event would you like to host?
I'd just be looking into hosting a viewing party in the future, we have access to a large inflatable screen that can be put beach side and its something worth considering.
That sounds really cool and could be great for Worlds!
Exactly, it would be dependent on what sort of crowd we could pull.
Hopefully Avant make it! They were awesome last year.
You should tell people when they bought tickets that there were side screens to watch the live matches. Now I feel I just wasted 60 dollars for a seat.
You won't regret it. But if you really feel that way, I'm sure you can sell your ticket easily.

adc 4 da win{{champion:51}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:96}} {{item:3093}} {{item:3153}} {{item:1042}}

my summoner name is obvi the best :3
maybe the offspring of teemo and tristanna   ;)
riot pls make some more yordles plz :D

I know a little bit late, but I have a ticket and I will just like to ask. Will there be breaks within rounds of league matches during the OPL tournament viewing (the actually league game time)? Cause my friend and i might come pretty late to the event but we still want ALL OF THE MERCHANDISE! Also just how stock reliant is the shop?
{{champion:103}}
do you need to pay for Themed games and activities, how much does the Merchandise would cost.
Hey, the community games on Lavender Green are all free as are all the activities in the Community Hall. Come along and bring your friends!
